trans-unit.source: DocumentDB query cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: DocumentDB query cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A printable query cheat sheet that helps you use DocumentDB's SQL-like grammar to query JSON documents in its NoSQL database.
trans-unit.target: A printable query cheat sheet that helps you use DocumentDB's SQL-like grammar to query JSON documents in its NoSQL database.

trans-unit.source: Downloadable DocumentDB SQL query cheat sheet
trans-unit.target: Downloadable DocumentDB SQL query cheat sheet

trans-unit.source: The DocumentDB Query Cheat Sheet helps you quickly write queries for DocumentDB data by displaying common queries, keywords, built-in functions, and operators in an easy to print reference sheet.
trans-unit.target: The DocumentDB Query Cheat Sheet helps you quickly write queries for DocumentDB data by displaying common queries, keywords, built-in functions, and operators in an easy to print reference sheet.

trans-unit.source: DocumentDB supports relational, hierarchical, and spatial querying of JSON documents using <link><linkText>SQL</linkText><title></title></link> without specifying a schema or secondary indexes.
trans-unit.target: DocumentDB supports relational, hierarchical, and spatial querying of JSON documents using <link><linkText>SQL</linkText><title></title></link> without specifying a schema or secondary indexes.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the standard ANSI-SQL keywords and operators, DocumentDB supports JavaScript user defined functions (UDFs), JavaScript operators, and a multitude of built-in functions.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the standard ANSI-SQL keywords and operators, DocumentDB supports JavaScript user defined functions (UDFs), JavaScript operators, and a multitude of built-in functions.

trans-unit.source: Download the DocumentDB query cheat sheet
trans-unit.target: Download the DocumentDB query cheat sheet

trans-unit.source: Write your queries faster by downloading the query cheat sheet and using it as a quick reference.
trans-unit.target: Write your queries faster by downloading the query cheat sheet and using it as a quick reference.

trans-unit.source: The cheat sheet shows common SQL queries used to retrieve data from two example JSON documents.
trans-unit.target: The cheat sheet shows common SQL queries used to retrieve data from two example JSON documents.

trans-unit.source: To keep it nearby, you can print the single-sided cheat sheet in page letter size (8.5 x 11 in.).
trans-unit.target: To keep it nearby, you can print the single-sided cheat sheet in page letter size (8.5 x 11 in.).

trans-unit.source: **Download the cheat sheet here: <link><linkText>Microsoft DocumentDB query cheat sheet</linkText><title></title></link>**
trans-unit.target: **Download the cheat sheet here: <link><linkText>Microsoft DocumentDB query cheat sheet</linkText><title></title></link>**

trans-unit.source: <linkText>DocumentDB query cheat sheet: Quick reference to the SQL grammar supported by DocumentDB.</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>DocumentDB query cheat sheet: Quick reference to the SQL grammar supported by DocumentDB.</linkText>

trans-unit.source: For a walk through of the query options available in DocumentDB, see <link><linkText>Query DocumentDB</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For a walk through of the query options available in DocumentDB, see <link><linkText>Query DocumentDB</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For the related reference documentation, see <link><linkText>DocumentDB SQL Query Language</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For the related reference documentation, see <link><linkText>DocumentDB SQL Query Language</linkText><title></title></link>.
